Package aima.gui.swing.framework

Class DemoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.gui.swing.framework.AgentAppController
      • aima.gui.swing.framework.DemoController
  • public class DemoController
extends AgentAppController
    Simple controller implementation which shows the relationship between buttons and selector activations and controller method calls.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        The associated AgentAppFrame calls this method when the clear button is pressed.
        Specified by:
        clear in class AgentAppController

      • prepare

        public void prepare​(java.lang.String changedSelector)
        The associated AgentAppFrame calls this method when the prepare button is pressed or the selection state of the selectors changes.
        Specified by:
        prepare in class AgentAppController
        Parameters:
        changedSelector - Name of the changed selector or null.

      • isPrepared

        public boolean isPrepared()
        Checks whether the current environment is prepared for starting simulation. The associated AgentAppFrame uses this information for enabling the run and step buttons.
        Specified by:
        isPrepared in class AgentAppController

      • run

        public void run​(MessageLogger logger)
        The associated AgentAppFrame calls this method when the run button is activated. This code runs in a second thread, which can be stopped by the GUI at any time. Implementations should avoid to access swing components because they are not thread safe.
        Specified by:
        run in class AgentAppController

      • step

        public void step​(MessageLogger logger)
        The associated AgentAppFrame calls this method when the step button is activated. This code runs in a second thread, which can be stopped by the GUI at any time. Implementations should avoid to access swing components because they are not thread-safe.
        Specified by:
        step in class AgentAppController

      • update

        public void update​(SimulationThread agentThread)
        This method is automatically called after the run and step methods have finished. Implementations are responsible for displaying status information in the frame and also for cleaning up the prepared environment if the simulation was canceled.
        Specified by:
        update in class AgentAppController
        Parameters:
        agentThread - The thread which was used to run the agent.
